channel.title: Clan Rank Icons [PI/Refactored]
channel.description: I have recently modified the clan chat base that was on my server so that it has ranks, commands, and that you join it whenever you log back in. I currently only have it saying the rank name; e.g. General. I also have a 459 text engine added so I have the updated image tags; e.g. <img=5>. But when I add that instead of the rank name, it just says that. Any help would be appreciated whether it be server or client sided.

item.title: Clan Rank Icons [PI/Refactored]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I have recently modified the clan chat base that was on my server so that it has ranks, commands, and that you join it whenever you log back in. I currently only have it saying the rank name; e.g. General. I also have a 459 text engine added so I have the updated image tags; e.g. <img=5>. But when I add that instead of the rank name, it just says that. Any help would be appreciated whether it be server or client sided.
